title: 2.1 Master Challenge 2
question: Water exists in all three phases on Earth. You can fi nd it as liquid in rivers and streams, as solid on a snow-capped mountain, and as vapor in the surrounding air. Make an animation to demonstrate the change in phases of water. Draw the different sprites and costumes that would be required for your project.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

input = 1
 -2

 5
